Passive.Name: Unending Stream of Stars
Passive.Desc: At the start of the scene, draw an additional 2 cards.

Passive.Name: Star Burst
Passive.Desc: Every turn 2 add a "Star Fall" to Librarian's hand. Every turn 4 "Infi'nitas" and every turn 6 add both to Librarian's hand.

Passive.Name: Revenge Shadow
Passive.Desc: If hit 3 times or more by One Sided attacks, gain 3 Power next Scene.

Passive.Name: Regenerating Shadow
Passive.Desc: Recover 4 energy +1 every 2 emotion levels, if at [End of Turn] all Light was used. And draw 2 cards if hand is Empty at [End of Turn] +1 every 2 emotion levels.

Passive.Name: Speed IV
Passive.Desc: Add a dice for each emotional level of the Librarian.

Passive.Name: Hunting Horn Wielder
Passive.Desc: If no cards were used this Scene recover 3 Light. Librarian is immune to Burn. One stack of Burn is applied and kept for each Symphony used in order. Upon reaching and using the 5th Symphony all burn is lost and gives every Librarian 3 Strenght, Endurance and Haste, they restore 3 Light, and heals them by 9 HP.

Passive.Name: Valkiria Awakening
Passive.Desc: Gains the 3 E.G.O pages that belong to the Strongest Star in the Existance.

Passive.Name: Heart of a Dragon
Passive.Desc: Discard hand at end of Scene and draw 5 cards. Gain Young Zerk's E.G.O Page. For each card used increase "Mana Stack". Once the card "Cashout Engine" is used restore light equal to the count and restart the count.

Passive.Name: Draconic Skin Shed
Passive.Desc: When using a Combat Page with atleast one Defensive die, heal 1 to 8 HP times the amount of Defensive die in the page.
